price: 68 S’ils persistent à te contredire, dis-leur : « Allah, qui connaît parfaitement vos agissements,
arabic: وَإِن جَٰدَلُوكَ فَقُلِ ٱللَّهُ أَعۡلَمُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wa-in jādalūka faquli al-lahu aʿlamu bimā taʿmalūna
